name: Pirates: Pillage & Plunder
description:
Concept

Be the best pirate! Sail the sea, plunder treasure chests, and pillage forts! Use your plunder points to purchase bigger vessels and be the richest pirate on the sea!

Features in Development

Ships: NPC patrols, ship-to-ship combat, custom player colors, purchase cannons, factions

Crew: Hire more crew members

Forts: Claim forts to store plunder, build defenses to thwart attacks, raid other forts of other factions
